text: @realDonaldTrump @realDonaldTrump  where are your tax returns? Thanks for the early mail in Florida ballot!Was def hoping you would  catch #COVID19 in line. Remember when all you had to care about was a bunch of emails? And now you have Russian blood on your hands ? Time to step down #byedon
